original_title: Honoring a Broadway Legacy: Behind the Scenes of tick, tick...Boom!
overview: Go deep inside the film tick, tick...BOOM! with director Lin-Manuel Miranda, actor Andrew Garfield and the rest of the film's acclaimed ensemble. The award-winning biopic tells the story of the late Tony AwardÂ®-winning legend Jonathan Larson, an artist at a crossroads desperate to tell his story.
title: Honoring a Broadway Legacy: Behind the Scenes of tick, tick...Boom!
